aboutMe.title: About Me
description: I'm a backend developer based in Noida, India.
I'm experienced in providing End-to-End Software Delivery using Agile Methodologies.
I'm self-motivated, flexible, and always keen on learning new things in life.
I'm also a self-professed cook.

roleDescription: At TCS, I'm responsible for working in a collaborative environment, requirement gathering and analysis, end-to-end development, and deployment for the clients.
I'm working in the Healthcare domain (IT and Services industry) for TCS's US Clients, where we work on these tools and technologies:
C#, .NET Framework, ADO.NET, ASP.NET, Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), MVC 5, SSIS, Microsoft SQL Server 2008R2, Microsoft VS Studio, TFS and VSTS.
